ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup barbecue sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's®)
kosher salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste
kosher salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Skin-on, bone-in chicken stays juicier than boneless cuts during baking
Brush barbecue sauce during last 10-15 minutes of cooking to prevent burning
Use meat thermometer to ensure internal temperature reaches 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple weeknight recipe. Are you comfortable judging doneness with a thermometer, or would you prefer a time-based approach?
